page.title: 14POLITICS
page.content: BRECON AND RADNOR BY ELECTION During this survey a By Election has taken place in the Brecon and Radnor Parliamentary Constituency.The candidates in the election were, Christopher Butler - Conservative, Richard Livsey - Liberal/Alliance, Richard Willey - Labour,Janet Davies- Plaid Cymru,Lord Such - Official Monster Raving Loony,Andre Genillard- Free The World From Multiple Sclerosis Mr.Everest-Independant Conservative. The result announced at 2p.m. on 5th. July 1985 was as follows:- Livsey-13753 Willey-13194 Butler-10631 Davies-435 Such-202 Everest-154 Genillard-43. Majority - 559 79% of electors voted.
